name: BreakOut (itch) (Swords_Oath)
description:
Play the classic arcade game BreakOut with the added twist of a 3D walking area. While it may look like a classic 2D game behind the scenes the robots are pulling all the triggers as you participate in their experiment.

Make sure to play full-screen for best experience and performance.

-Controls in 3D Space-

W,A,S,D Movement

Mouse to View

Escape to show mouse to click buttons

Double Click to hide mouse and re-activate View
